message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Can we meet in the middle?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. It's a fair compromise between our initial offers. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $16000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my initial offer of $15000. Can we make a deal at $16000?

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above your initial offer, so I'm willing to meet you halfway from my initial offer of $20000. How about we try $17500?
I'm still not quite there, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer of $16000. How about we try $17000?
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob! I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to go below $18000. How about we try $18250?
I'm really interested in this product, but I'm not willing to go above $17500. Can you meet me at $17500?
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not willing to go below $18000. How about we try $18100?
